entry.title: Embrace Your Inner Witch with AI, Now Fluent in Occult Sciences
entry.summary: Mistral Trismegistus-7B is the latest LLM in town. It can help you read palms and instruct you on how to ride your flying broom.

entry.title: Bitcoin Whales and Ethereum Whales Are Not the Same: Glassnode
entry.summary: While BTC whales accumulate, ETH whales sell, according to Glassnode. What's going on?

entry.title: Venezuela Offer ‘Unique Crypto Utility’ Amid Hyperinflation: Report
entry.summary: Contrary to the assertions of cryptocurrency advocates, Venezuela is headed toward a “de-facto dollarization economy.”

entry.title: Sega Exec Says Blockchain Gaming an 'Unknown World' Worth Exploring
entry.summary: Sega is co-developing a trading card NFT game based on Sangokushi Taisen for Asia, and Sega's Co-COO is optimistic about its potential.

entry.title: Why Cyberpunk 2077's Developer Needed AI to Complete 'Phantom Liberty'
entry.summary: After the passing of actor Miłogost Reczek, CD Projekt Red used AI to recreate the voice of Viktor Vektor in Cyberpunk 2077: Phantom Liberty.

entry.title: This Week in Coins: War and Inflation Chill Crypto Investments
entry.summary: The Israel–Palestine war and persistent inflation readings contributed to the downward price pressure.

entry.title: NASA Tests Deep Space Communications on Six-Year Asteroid Mission
entry.summary: JPL’s Deep Space Optical Communication will harness lasers for superior data relay back to Earth during a six-year mission.

entry.title: MetaMask Crypto Wallet Briefly Pulled from Apple App Store
entry.summary: The app was restored within hours, while other wallet apps remained available.

entry.title: SEC Won’t Appeal Grayscale Bitcoin ETF Ruling: Reports
entry.summary: But that doesn't mean a spot market Bitcoin ETF is a lock.

entry.title: Ripple’s Win Over SEC Gave XRP a Massive Boost—That’s All Gone Now
entry.summary: XRP boomed in July following a federal judge's ruling. It has since crashed back down again.

entry.title: Microsoft Now Owns 'Call of Duty' Maker Activision Blizzard—What Happens Next?
entry.summary: Xbox maker Microsoft just acquired Call of Duty, Diablo, Candy Crush, and Overwatch. What does it mean for players and the games they love?

entry.title: Google Adds AI Features to Search and Browsing May Never Be the Same
entry.summary: With tech giants racing to capitalize on generative AI, Google is infusing Search with creative new capabilities.

entry.title: What Happens If the SEC Doesn't Appeal Grayscale Bitcoin ETF Ruling?
entry.summary: The SEC shows no signs of fighting back against its court loss to Grayscale.

entry.title: Ethereum, Solana and XRP Lead Losses in Rough Week for Crypto Market
entry.summary: This is the lowest price Ethereum has traded at in the past seven months.

entry.title: There's a Film Festival Happening in Minecraft Right Now
entry.summary: Looking to catch some independent cinema? You might be surprised at the locale—this festival is running inside a Minecraft game world. Here's why.

entry.title: You Can Buy Taylor Swift Movie Tickets With Bitcoin, Dogecoin, and SHIB
entry.summary: Tickets to the record-shattering Taylor Swift concert film can also be bought with ETH, XRP, and more via AMC and BitPay.

entry.title: AI Just Deciphered an Ancient Herculaneum Scroll Without Unrolling It
entry.summary: The word "purple" has not been found in opened scroll fragments before.

author.name: Decrypt AI, Edited by Stacy Elliot

entry.title: AI Could Help Brain Surgeons Diagnose Tumors in Real Time
entry.summary: Researchers introduce an AI model that diagnoses central nervous system tumors rapidly, achieving 90% accuracy in early testing.

entry.title: Nitro Nation World Tour Review: Gear Up With NFTs—Or Face the Grind
entry.summary: REVIEW: The latest Nitro Nation mobile game has some fun moments, but this drag-racer feels like a pay-to-win game at its core.

entry.title: Tether CEO Steps Down, Naming Paolo Ardoino as Successor at Stablecoin Issuer
entry.summary: Paolo Ardoino has already acted as the face of the stablecoin giant for years.

entry.title: SBF Trial Live Updates: Caroline Ellison Considered Resigning Several Times
entry.summary: FTX founder Sam Bankman-Fried faces seven criminal charges related to the dramatic collapse of his crypto empire. Here's the latest on his trial.

entry.title: What Is Terra? The Chaotic Algorithmic Stablecoin Protocol Explained
entry.summary: Terra is a Cosmos-based protocol that powers a suite of algorithmic stablecoins, which aim to maintain their pegs using a coin called LUNA.

entry.title: Terra Says Citadel Securities Caused UST Stablecoin Depeg
entry.summary: As for the evidence, Terraform points to an alleged conversation Citadel founder Ken Griffin had with a pseudonymous trader.

entry.title: THORChain Soars 8% as DeFi Exchange Lifts Trading Pause
entry.summary: THORChain's leading exchange also updated its terms of service, introducing new blocks on countries sanctioned by the United States.

entry.title: AI Sparks Security Fears at US Space Force
entry.summary: The U.S. Space Force put a stop to personal AI use on duty, joining companies wary of generative AI's implications on privacy and security.

entry.title: Uniswap Launches Mobile Ethereum Wallet on Android
entry.summary: Launched in beta, Uniswap's wallet offers automatic switching between mainnet and layer-2 networks, along with other features.

entry.title: You Can Now Add Thomas the Tank Engine to Starfield—Yes, Really
entry.summary: Someone has created a mod that adds Thomas the Tank Engine to Skyrim creator Bethesda's latest game, Starfield. Now you can't unsee his face.

entry.title: Senators Want to Ban AI Copycats Like Fake Drake and The Weeknd Song
entry.summary: A new bipartisan bill proposed Thursday would create a new federal law forbidding the creation of AI-generated mimics of a person without their consent.

entry.title: Crypto Gaming Attracted $600M Worth of Q3 Investment Despite Bear Market
entry.summary: While the gaming industry continues to be plagued by mass layoffs, crypto gaming is still seeing many millions invested each quarter.

entry.title: There's Now a 'Stronger Possibility' Russian Actors Involved in $477 Million FTX Hack
entry.summary: Many funds stolen from the bankrupt exchange have been combined with those of Russian criminals.

entry.title: Melcogate: AI Blamed for Leaked Audio That Sparked Argentina Political Drama
entry.summary: Politicians in Argentina point fingers at AI for leaked audio used to allege a former central bank president of sexual harassment.

entry.title: Fortnite Reddit Reward Token BRICK Surges 131%—Why?
entry.summary: BRICKs are booming, as Reddit’s Fortnite-inspired crypto token sees a substantial pop—and Reddit’s MOON token rose too.

entry.title: Ex-Voyager CEO Sued By CFTC and FTC for Misleading Customers
entry.summary: The government agencies say the company lied about how "safe" their customers' assets really were.

entry.title: FTX Favorite Solana Dips After Frequent Mentions in Sam Bankman-Fried's Trial
entry.summary: The asset was mentioned again during Bankman-Fried's trial. It's now down significantly compared to last week.

entry.title: You Can Play 'Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III' Now—Here's How
entry.summary: UPDATE: The Modern Warfare III beta has extended from PlayStation to Xbox and PC as well. Here's how to get into Early Access today.

entry.title: CEO Pleads Guilty to Crypto Futures Cherry-Picking Scheme
entry.summary: This is the first time a commodities trading advisor has been charged with a operating a fraudulent crypto trading scheme.

entry.title: NBA's LaMelo and Lonzo Ball—And Their Dad—Star in NFT Game 'StrayShot'
entry.summary: The NBA stars and their family have signed a deal to appear in the upcoming battle royale shooter StrayShot, which uses the SKALE blockchain.

entry.title: Cathie Wood's Ark Invest Refiles Bitcoin ETF Application—Here's What's New
entry.summary: The revised submission from Ark now includes risks of a change to Bitcoin’s code as well as how its custodian will handle assets.

entry.title: Why AI Arena is Building on Arbitrum
entry.summary: AI Arena CEO Brandon Da Silva and COO Wei Xie discuss the challenges that come with building on Ethereum, ETH sidechains, and layer-two blockchains.

entry.title: Compute Anything on Bitcoin? What You Need to Know About BitVM
entry.summary: A new Bitcoin proposal says anything can be computed on the network, but devs are split on whether that's a good idea.

entry.title: Pet3rPan_ on venture DAOs and blockchain games
entry.summary:
Welcome to the 4th episode of this time will be different.
Our guest for today's episode is Pet3rpan_ from Metacartel, 1kx, HydraVentures, and more!
https://twitter.com/pet3rpan_
This Time Will Be Different is sponsored by 1000x https://decrypt.co/1000x

entry.title: Inside Shrapnel's Marketplace, New Map, and 'AI Director' Feature
entry.summary: Decrypt's Kate Irwin chats with Shrapnel's Head of Studio Don Norbury to get the latest updates on how the NFT-powered first-person sci-fi extraction shooter's development is progressing.

entry.title: 'Art of the Times': Art Blocks Founder Erick Calderon on the State of Generative Art
entry.summary: Art Blocks founder and CEO Erick Calderon sat down with Sander Lutz, lead culture reporter at Decrypt's SCENE, at Art Blocks Marfa Weekend 2023. They discuss the evolution of the company and the generative art world, along with what draws art enthusiasts to be an active part of the community.

entry.title: Decrypt Learn: Digital Ownership Explained
entry.summary: One of the most powerful aspects of blockchain technology is its ability to provide us genuine ownership of our digital assets. This is called digital ownership. In this video, we’ll deep dive into digital ownership, why it matters, and how web3 makes owning digital assets like our social networks, music libraries, personal data, and beyond possible. Author: Clarissa Watson, Senior Writer at Consensys.

entry.title: Martin Shkreli on E/ACC and SBF in Prison
entry.summary: Reza Jafery and Martin Shkreli sit down for a casual conversation about the growing movement that is E/ACC, what songs they could recite at gunpoint, and whether or not SBF will thrive or just survive during his time in prison.

entry.title: What Can AI Do in Gaming?
entry.summary: AI Arena CEO Brandon Da Silva and COO Wei Xie discuss how artificial intelligence can shape the video game experience.

entry.title: 'There Are No Real Standards': Ready Player Me CEO Timmu Tõke on Building for an Open Gaming Ecosystem
entry.summary: Timmu Tõke, co-founder and CEO of Ready Player Me, joins Decrypt contributor Ryan Gladwin to discuss the startup's approach to powering avatars that are interoperable across games and metaverse platforms—and what's needed to convince the industry to adopt standards and open up.

entry.title: Blockchain Is 'Only Way' Forward for Gaming, Says Shrapnel Studio Head
entry.summary: Shrapnel Studio Head Don Norbury tells Kate Irwin the reasons why the upcoming first-person shooter game will offer a wide range of NFTs. He also reveals team-based gameplay plans and shares how game maps have already changed this year.

entry.title: Social Media Sentiment Is Key to Crypto Price Discovery
entry.summary: Sacha Ghebali, Director of Strategy and Business Development at The TIE, says social media sentiment remains a key factor in price movements for major cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin and Ethereum. However, he notes that sentiment has turned more negative lately amid regulatory uncertainty. Ghebali believes events like the Ripple lawsuit ruling significantly impacted sentiment and prices. André Beganski interviewed him at Messari Mainnet.

entry.title: 500Altcoins discusses DeFi Summer and the Dubai Crypto Scene - This Time Will Be Different - Episode 2
entry.summary: Our host Reza Jafery is joined by Gareth Fenney aka 500Altcoins. They discuss the glory days of DeFi Summer and whether or not its a smart move for builders in the crypto space to relocate to Dubai.

entry.title: Decentralize Derivatives Trading with Custom Blockchain
entry.summary: David Gogel of dYdX discusses how the decentralized exchange is building a custom blockchain to fully decentralize derivatives trading. He explained how the new dYdX chain will allow validators to run order books in memory, enabling decentralized order matching at scale. This shift aims to increase security and transparency for traders while maintaining the performance of centralized exchanges.

entry.title: Most Crypto Users Don't Trust Themselves to Keep Their Seed Phrase Safe: Ledger CEO
entry.summary: Decrypt's Stacy Elliott sat down with Ledger CEO Pascal Gauthier to discuss crypto custody post-FTX, and the hardware wallet manufacturer's controversial Ledger Recover service.

entry.title: Crypto Accounting Challenges and Opportunities
entry.summary: As crypto matures, accounting and tax regulations are evolving. Amy Kalnoki of Bitwave explains how her company helps crypto companies properly account for digital assets. She notes the importance of flexibility as new crypto assets emerge and regulations change. Stacy Elliott interviewed her at Messari Mainnet 2023.

entry.title: India's 1% Crypto Tax Has Been a Nightmare for High-Frequency Traders, Says Shardeum CEO
entry.summary: As India figures out its regulatory approach to the crypto industry, one thing is clear to Shardeum co-founder Nischal Shetty: “If you're a high-frequency trader, you can't afford to lose a percentage every time you sell,” he told Decrypt's Andre Beganski at Messari Mainnet in New York. “That's something that's caused a lot of issues.”

entry.title: Newly Partnered with Visa, Solana Focuses on Reliability
entry.summary: Solana has improved network reliability through upgrades like Quick and local fee markets. It recently partnered with Visa to allow settling transactions in USDC on Solana. This could enable merchants to receive instant payments and save on credit card processing fees. Stacy Elliott spoke with Austin Federa, Head of Strategy for the Solana Foundation, at Messari Mainnet 2023.

entry.title: We Need to Start Thinking About How we Make Crypto Easy to Use: Robinhood Crypto General Manager
entry.summary: Decrypt's Stacy Elliott sat down with Robinhood Crypto general manager Johann Kerbrat at Messari Mainnet 2023, to talk about the trading platform's crypto wallet, onboarding new users through simplicity, and keeping platform fees sustainable.

entry.title: Bitcoin's Narrative Is Shifting Towards Layer-2 Solutions
entry.summary: Rich Rines, original Core DAO contributor and former Coinbase engineer, discusses how the narrative around Bitcoin is shifting in 2023. While Bitcoin remains digital gold, new layer 2 solutions are emerging to unlock more utility and value from the huge amounts of capital stored in Bitcoin. He says these innovations can benefit Bitcoin holders while keeping Bitcoin maximalists happy by building outside the base layer. André Beganski interviewed him at Messari Mainnet 2023.

entry.title: Regulation Threatens U.S. Dominance of Financial Markets, Says CoinRoutes CEO
entry.summary: Dave Weisberger, Co-Founder and CEO of CoinRoutes, argued that excessive regulation in the U.S. threatens to undermine the country's long-standing dominance in global financial markets. He warned that other countries are embracing blockchain and crypto to build more efficient digital markets, which could cause the US to lose its competitive edge and trillions in GDP. Weisberger said CoinRoutes is now focusing more on expanding internationally due to restrictive policies in the U.S. He was interviewed by André Beganski of Decrypt at Messari Mainnet 2023.

entry.title: Explosive Growth Ahead for Enterprise Blockchain
entry.summary: Paul Brody drives Ernst & Young (EY) initiatives and investments in blockchain technology across consulting, audit, and tax business lines. He says enterprise blockchain adoption is nearing an inflection point. Brody believes blockchains will one day handle 40 billion transactions daily across industries like automotive and pharma. Stacy Elliott interviewed him at Messari Mainnet 2023.
